title: Add professional medical-themed background animations to header

requirements.text: Add subtle, professional medical-themed background animations to the header section that complement the existing 'Oishi Heal Touch' branding without overwhelming the content

quotes: can you add some proffessional medical themed background animations in the header section

acceptanceCriteria: Background animations are visible in the header section containing the logo and 'Oishi Heal Touch' text
Animations use medical/healthcare theming (e.g., subtle pulse effects, flowing lines suggesting heartbeat or medical imagery)
Animations are professional and subtle, not distracting from header content
Animations work smoothly on both desktop and mobile viewports
Performance remains smooth with no janky animations

requirements.text: Ensure the header animations integrate seamlessly with the existing sticky header design and glassmorphism effects already present in the application
acceptanceCriteria: Animations do not interfere with sticky header behavior
Animations complement existing glassmorphism and premium design styles
Header text and logo remain clearly readable over the animated background
Animations maintain consistent visual coherence with the OKLCH color system and brand palette

constraints: Do not modify the backend/main.mo file
Preserve the existing header structure with logo and 'Oishi Heal Touch' text
Maintain mobile responsiveness and sticky header functionality
Keep animations subtle and professional to maintain healthcare credibility
nonGoals: Adding animations to other page sections beyond the header
Changing the header layout or navigation structure
Modifying the logo or branding text styling
Adding interactive animations that require user input
